headline: Royal Couple To Cede Titles In Family Rift
abstract: An agreement represents one of the most dramatic ruptures within the British royal family since King Edward VIII abdicated the throne in 1936 to marry an American woman, Wallis Simpson.
lead_paragraph: WINDSOR, England â€” Prince Harry and his wife, Meghan, will stop using their loftiest royal titles, give up state funding and repay at least $3 million in taxpayer money used to refurbish their official residence at Windsor Castle under an agreement announced by Buckingham Palace on Saturday.
keywords: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
